title: Simple and Easy to use Ticketing Solution
name: Stephen W.
pros: Pros: Coconut Tickets, is one of the best ticketing systems on the market, it professes to have been developed by Event Organisers for Event Organisers and I suspect that is correct. The developers have thought of just about everything this we as an event company could need from ticketing solution. It is versatile and easy to interrogate to get information when needed. The scanning API works well (dependent on your location)all in all a good all round ticketing tool.
cons:
Cons: There are very few things that we dislike about the system. What we have noticed is that the developer listens to the end user and therefore the system is still to a small extend 'Work in Progress'

Page functionality (tabbing forwards and backwards) we know is being looked at.

To be honest, there is very little to dislike about Coconut tickets
overall: Overall: If anything Coconut has helped resolve problems rather than creating any. Our previous ticketing solution that was used for an Ice Rink was cumbersome and difficult to add customer to with Telephone sales, with Coconut it is easy, and through conversation with the developer we know there are still more (very minor) improvements going to be made in this specific area.

title: Coconut Tickets Vender Pitches Review
name: Alex M.
pros: Pros: I started using Coconut Tickets' vendor pitch feature to sell trader pitches & stalls at my events/festivals. We were using word document application forms before and manually inputting data. I had been looking for an online solution for quite a while when Coconut Tickets got in touch. Their vendor pitch feature is exactly what I was looking for and I can do everything in one place - applications, document uploads, email templates and payments. I haven't found another solution out there that does exactly what I need. Their customer service is also absolutely amazing - very fast response, quick bug fixing and even making improvements based on my suggestions.
cons: Cons: As Coconut Tickets vendor pitches is a fairly new feature there have been a few bugs and teething problems along the way. However, as I explained above, their customer service has been amazing and all issues have been fixed very quickly. I have almost been a guinea pig as this feature has developed and have offered suggestions of improvement, which have been taken on board massively. Certain tools can sometimes be a little difficult to understand at first, but i would definitely stick with it, ask for help, and it will solve all your trader applications needs!
overall: Overall: Coconut Tickets has helped us transfer our trader/vendor process from a manual, time consuming task to a an easier and much faster process. Traders can fill in an online application form, submit their bids/choose their pitches, upload all H&S documents and agree to our T&Cs. All this info is stored within my CC profile and I can also export all information as an excel spreadsheet as well as download all documents. There a number of different pitch sales formats available that suit all our needs and as I said above, the customer service is wonderful!

title: One of the best platforms to book tickets online for various events !`
name: ELDHOSE K.
pros: Pros: What I love the most out of coconut tickets is that, it has all the needed features on an event booking platform. The UI seems to be more simple and user friendly. I can easily book my tickets for the specified event more conveniently using coconut tickets !
cons: Cons: The UI is very simple and lack of a mobile app seems to have lower the user base of coconut tickets, kindly request them to have a mobile app ready in place !
overall: Overall: I can easily book tickets for my desired event using this great tool, happy for using this !

title: All in one ticketing platform for buying event tickets
name: EBIN E.
pros: Pros: Coconut Tickets is the best platform for searching of tickets for various events happening nearby. It is a great tool to find and discover events which happens on various locations. It is really helpful when it comes to book tickets as the workflow is extremely simple. The UI is pretty simple and easy to use.
cons: Cons: There is not pretty much thinks we dislike, if the home page design can be made more user friendly it will definitely help. Also please consider having a mobile app.
overall: Overall: We can find and book tickets in an easy manner using Coconut Tickets.

title: An affordable whole ticketing package
name: Harry L.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I find the monthly packages affordable and the packs you can choose well put together. For our events it is especially good because we are seasonal and only have to pay for the month we're selling tickets.
cons: Cons: Nothing as of yet, working well for our events.
overall: Overall: We can find and book tickets in an easy manner using Coconut Tickets.

title: An honest platform that shows it doesn't have to cost a small fortune
name: Dan H.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The simplicity of the pricing structure is very helpful and allows you to know exactly what you are spending on the service without any hidden surprises.
cons: Cons: Initially the integration of the software with our website was tricky and also setting up the link to our payment platform. However the support was great and we were able to resolve this.
overall: Overall: We can find and book tickets in an easy manner using Coconut Tickets.
